nodes.text: Clem Stato was a male Human who lived during the Galactic War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. A merchant like his relatives Meridat, Felusia, and Nelva, Clem Stato sold furniture and decorations on the space stations Carrick Station and Vaiken Spacedock.

A Cartel Market Decorations vendor who appears on both the Republic and Imperial Fleets, Clem Stato was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in the 2014 Digital Expansion Galactic Strongholds.
